section.name: Welcome to the Ant Projects Area
section.h3: This is where the Ant sub-projects live!
section.p: Now, that Ant has become an Apache Top-Level Project it is time to make space on this Web-Page for Ant sub-projects. In the first step Antidote, the Ant GUI, is included, but some others may follow!
To make sure you do not miss anything: Stay tuned and visit this page from time to time :)!
